text: BMSOFT provides any user with the Data and gives an easy way to search for, export or delete it.

Like many apps, we use "cookies" to collect information.
We only keep logs/archives for 30 days, so that it can be reactivated in the future, and it will not be processed for any other purpose.
We use the Data solely for providing you services, forming reports for provided services and sending periodic emails regarding provided or other services.
While using our Service, we may ask you or your website users or visitors to provide certain personally identifiable information or other data that can be used for identifying and communicating with you, or providing the requested service.
